question: When did Limoges receive the label "City of Art and History"?
asked_question_translated: Kdaj je Limoges prejel naziv "mesto umetnosti in zgodovine"?
answer: Limoges je prejel naziv "mesto umetnosti in zgodovine" leta 2008.
answer_translated_eng: Limoges was awarded the title "City of Art and History" in 2008.
